sentence: In December, another Trump-backed Senate candidate, the former professional football player Herschel Walker, who is running in Georgia, told Axios he was accountable for past violent behavior toward his former wife, Cindy Grossman.
title: Ex-Wife of Eric Greitens, Senate Candidate in Missouri, Accuses Him of Abuse
Mark Foley. Dennis Hastert. Matt Gaetz. And Republicans want to pontificate about morals?

sentence: The same could be said about Herschel Walker in Georgia.
title: Opinion: What the parade of GOP sexual misconduct allegations really tells us

sentence: The only other Georgia candidate who has Haleys backing is Herschel Walker, who is running for U.S. Senate.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: Nikki Haley endorses 2nd District GOP candidate Jeremy Hunt

sentence: Next week, Georgia Republicans are all but certain to nominate Herschel Walker, who played for Trumps USFL football team in the early 1980s and was propelled into the Senate race by the ex-president.
author: Paul Kane
title: GOP voters choose nominees with first loyalty to Trump, not McConnell
